content:
ICS 6D (Online)
Winter 2019


Class Format

Eventually, there will be a Canvas space for this class. This page is to inform propsective students when they need to be available in order to enroll for the course.

Midterms will be given 4-5PM on Fridays. The specific dates for the tests will be made available a week or so before the start of class. In the meantime, you must reserve this time block every Friday in order to take the class. There will be no required activities during this time on non-test days.

There will be a final exam on Monday June 10, 7-9PM. The final exam is required, so you must be available at this time in order to take the class.

The lectures for this class will be in video form, which you can do in your own time. There are questions associated with each lecture which will have specific due dates. Online discussions will be held on Mondays at 10AM, 11AM, and 1PM. You must be signed up for one discussion.

--Prof. Sandy Irani
